keyword: how many calories in a sausage egg mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a sausage egg mcmuffin, plus full nutrition facts like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and custom orders. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage Egg McMuffin provides ~480 kcal and ~21 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Canadian bacon instead of pork sausage

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
How much fat and sodium in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Around 31 g total fat (13 g saturated) and 830 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, about 30 g carbs with 2 g fiber and 2 g sugars.

faqs.q: How does McDonald's sausage egg mcmuffin compare to homemade?
faqs.a: Fast-food version is higher in sodium and saturated fat due to processing; homemade can be lower with fresh ingredients.
